**Question 1**

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from scipy.io import loadmat
import pandas as pd

data = loadmat('mnist_all.mat')
data.keys()
```

```{python}
fig, ax = plt.subplots(2, 5)
for i in range(10):
  ax[i % 2][i % 5].imshow(data[f"train{i}"][0].reshape((28,28)), cmap='gray')
  ax[i % 2][i % 5].set_title(f"Number {i}")
plt.show()
```
